doc:
A Martinez https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A_Martinez 0 Adolfo Larrue Martínez III (born September 27, 1948), better known as A Martinez, is an American actor and singer with roles in the daytime soap operas Santa Barbara, General Hospital, One Life to Live, The Bold and the Beautiful, and Days of Our Lives, and the primetime dramas L.A. Law, Profiler, and Longmire. In movies, he played the role of Cimmeron in the Western The Cowboys (1972), with John Wayne. Adolfo_Larrue_Martínez_III ( born September_27_,_1948 ) , better_known as A_Martinez , is an_American_actor_and_singer with roles in the_daytime_soap_operas Santa_Barbara , General_Hospital , One_Life to_Live , The_Bold and the_Beautiful , and Days of Our_Lives , and the_primetime_dramas_L.A._Law , Profiler , and Longmire . In movies , he played the_role of Cimmeron in the_Western_The_Cowboys ( 1972_) , with John_Wayne .
